class.name: SelectionPolicy

javadoc.text: Algorithm used to select a chromosome pair from a population.
Select two chromosomes from the population.
javadoc.param: population the population from which the chromosomes are choosen.
javadoc.throws: MathIllegalArgumentException if the population is not compatible with this {@link SelectionPolicy}
